languages.en_US: &aBeautiful
languages.zh_TW: &a漂亮

languages.en_US: &7Breezy
languages.zh_TW: &7和煦春風

languages.en_US: &9Chilly
languages.zh_TW: &9寒冷

languages.en_US: &9Rainy
languages.zh_TW: &9多雨

languages.en_US: &eScorching
languages.zh_TW: &e灼熱

languages.en_US: &eHot
languages.zh_TW: &e炎熱

languages.en_US: &eWarm
languages.zh_TW: &e溫暖

languages.en_US: &9Cold
languages.zh_TW: &9寒冷

languages.en_US: &cStormy
languages.zh_TW: &c風暴

languages.en_US: &9Freezing
languages.zh_TW: &9極冷

languages.en_US: &7Snowy
languages.zh_TW: &7多雪

languages.en_US: &7Calm
languages.zh_TW: &7平靜

languages.en_US: &aThe sun is shining, the grass is green and the weather is %1
languages.zh_TW: &a陽光明媚, 草地綠, 今天的天氣為 %1

languages.en_US: &7A cool breeze touches your skin, it is going to be %1
languages.zh_TW: &7涼爽的微風拂過你的皮膚, 這將是 %1

languages.en_US: &3You shiver as frost glistens around you, it is very %1
languages.zh_TW: &3你顫抖著霜凍在你周圍閃閃發亮, 這非常的 %1

languages.en_US: &3A loud rain falls and wets the ground, it is %1
languages.zh_TW: &3一陣大雨把地面澆濕, 是 %1

languages.en_US: &eThe sun burns your skin and the ground hurts to touch, it is %1
languages.zh_TW: &e太陽灼傷你的皮膚, 大地在觸摸時很痛, 這是 %1

languages.en_US: &eIt is going to be very %1 &etoday
languages.zh_TW: &e今天會非常的 %1

languages.en_US: &eA soothing warmth hugs you as you move, it is a %1 &eday
languages.zh_TW: &e舒適的溫暖在你移動時擁抱你, 這是 %1 &e的一天

languages.en_US: &3The water is so very %1 &3today
languages.zh_TW: &3今天的水非常的 %1

languages.en_US: &cA great %1 &cbrews, the Gods are angry... Brace yourself!
languages.zh_TW: &c一場 %1 &c在醞釀, 眾神都在生氣... 振作起來!

languages.en_US: &3The water freezes with a sheet of ice and you feel a great cold, it is %1
languages.zh_TW: &3水在地上結冰, 你感受到很冷, 是 %1

languages.en_US: &7A great white blanket covers the world, it is %1
languages.zh_TW: &7一條巨大的白色毯子遮蓋了整個世界, 這是 %1

languages.en_US: &7The world rests with the sun and all is calm... Until the mobs come to eat you!
languages.zh_TW: &7世界在太陽的落下一切都平靜了... 直到怪物來吃掉你!

languages.en_US: &eSpring
languages.zh_TW: &e春季

languages.en_US: &6Summer
languages.zh_TW: &6夏季

languages.en_US: &2Autumn
languages.zh_TW: &2秋季

languages.en_US: &9Winter
languages.zh_TW: &9冬季

languages.en_US: The sun rises, the flowers smell fresh and there is a %1 in your step... literally!
languages.zh_TW: 太陽升起, 花兒聞起來很清新, 你的腳步有了 %1 ... 字面上的意思!

languages.en_US: Today feels warmer than the others, maybe even too warm... %1 has arrived!
languages.zh_TW: 今天感覺比其他時候更加溫暖, 甚至可能太暖了... %1 到來!

languages.en_US: A cool breeze whispers to the leaves that fall from the trees, it is %1!
languages.zh_TW: 一陣涼風輕佛著從樹上掉下的樹葉, 這是 %1!

languages.en_US: A few snowflakes fall and the world grows cold, time for %1 to make its mark...
languages.zh_TW: 幾片雪花飄落, 世界變得寒冷, 是時候讓 %1 留下自己的印記...

languages.en_US: &cYour hearts beats rapidly, yours legs tremble and you find you cannot regenerate health until this Devastation passes!
languages.zh_TW: &c你的心臟快速跳動, 雙腿在顫抖, 直到你發覺這場災難過後, 你才能恢復你的健康!

languages.en_US: &aThe breeze feels so good on your skin, armour would just ruin the effect...
languages.zh_TW: &a微風在你的皮膚上感覺很好, 但穿著裝備會破壞效果...

languages.en_US: &aYour armour gives you a soothing warmth, making you resistant to the harsh cold!
languages.zh_TW: &a你的裝備帶給你舒適的溫暖, 使你抵禦嚴寒!

languages.en_US: &cThe world is freezing over and so will you if you fail to get armour on!
languages.zh_TW: &c世界已凍結, 如果你無法穿上你的裝備, 你也會一樣!

languages.en_US: &7Be careful with your hat, the wind is getting up...
languages.zh_TW: &7注意你的帽子, 起風了...

languages.en_US: &eWalking on sand in this heat must be painful!
languages.zh_TW: &e在這種高溫下行走在沙子上一定很痛苦!

languages.en_US: &9A chill runs down your spine as water turns to ice!
languages.zh_TW: &9當水變成冰時, 將使你背脊發涼!

languages.en_US: &9A source of heat would be great to carry around in this cold!
languages.zh_TW: &9在這種寒冷之中, 隨身攜帶熱源是很好的!

languages.en_US: &aThis weather is so revitalizing!
languages.zh_TW: &a這樣的天氣真讓人心曠神怡!

languages.en_US: &eThe nearby iron starts to sizzle, better put it down for now...
languages.zh_TW: &e附近的鐵開始嘶嘶作響, 最好暫時先放下...

languages.en_US: &9The water flows with a strong current, it will be hard to wade through!
languages.zh_TW: &9水流目前很大, 會很難在水流中跋涉!

languages.en_US: &eThis is most definitely NOT the weather for full armour...
languages.zh_TW: &e這絕對不是全副武裝的天氣...

languages.en_US: &cThe water is near ice and dangerously cold to the touch...
languages.zh_TW: &c水非常接近冰的溫度, 觸碰到會有非常危險的冷...

languages.en_US: &7The dirt coats your boots and becomes hard to move through in this weather...
languages.zh_TW: &7在這種天氣下, 泥土覆蓋在你的靴子上, 變得難以移動...

languages.en_US: &7Your stomach starts to grumble and you begin to crave some hearty soup...
languages.zh_TW: &7你的胃開始咕咕叫, 你開始渴望一些豐盛的湯...

languages.en_US: &7You feel the wind in your favour today!
languages.zh_TW: &7今天感受到的風對你有利!

languages.en_US: &aThe sun on your skin without armour gives you energy, Feels Good!
languages.zh_TW: &a陽光照射在沒有裝備的皮膚上為你提供能量, 感覺很棒!

languages.en_US: &aYour armour gives you a soothing warmth and makes you more Resistant to the world
languages.zh_TW: &a你的裝備帶給你舒適與溫暖, 使你對世界更有抵抗力

languages.en_US: &eYour hat just blew off, oh dear!
languages.zh_TW: &e哦 親愛的, 你的帽子剛剛被吹掉!

languages.en_US: &aA hot item in your inventory warms your heart and makes you Resistant to the cold world
languages.zh_TW: &a背包內有熱物品將使你的心臟感受到溫暖, 使你更能夠抵禦寒冷的世界

languages.en_US: &aThe sun from this world is so &eRevitalising&a, it is Regenerating you!
languages.zh_TW: &a來自這世界的陽光讓人&e恢復生機&a, 它正使你再生!

languages.en_US: &cThe water freezes in your bucket...
languages.zh_TW: &c水在你的水桶內結冰了...

languages.en_US: &cThe iron is soldering hot, try not to hold it for too long!
languages.zh_TW: &c鐵非常的燙, 請盡可能不要拿著太久!

languages.en_US: &cThe current crashes against you and your muscles cry in pain...
languages.zh_TW: &c水流正沖撞著你, 你的肌肉因疼痛而哭泣著...

languages.en_US: &cSweat drips from your forehead, it is too Hot for armour today...
languages.zh_TW: &c額頭上流淌著汗水, 今天太熱了, 不適合穿裝備...

languages.en_US: &cThe freezing water is killing you, get out of it if you want to live!
languages.zh_TW: &c冰凍的水正在殺死你, 如果你想要活下去, 就離開它!

languages.en_US: &aThat hit the spot, the delicious stew makes your wounds a little more bearable...
languages.zh_TW: &a這就對了, 美味的燉湯使你的傷口更可以忍受...

languages.en_US: &eThe mud sticks to your boots, slowing you down...
languages.zh_TW: &e泥巴黏在你的靴子上, 讓你變慢了...

languages.en_US: &aYou feel a rush of Wind in your Boots and go hurtling forwards!
languages.zh_TW: &a你在靴子內感受到一股風, 然後向前飛馳而去!

languages.en_US: &eAs you leave the world behind, the energising sunlight wears off...
languages.zh_TW: &e當你離開世界時, 充滿活力的陽光將逐漸消失...

languages.en_US: &cWithout armour, your body feels the cold once again and is no longer resistant to it
languages.zh_TW: &c沒有裝備, 你的身體再次感受到寒冷, 並不再有抗性

languages.en_US: &eYour body is no longer warmed and its Resistance wears away...
languages.zh_TW: &e你的身體不再暖活, 抗性也逐漸消退...

languages.en_US: &eAs the light of the world light leaves your skin, the &6Revitalising &eenergy leaves too...
languages.zh_TW: &e隨著世界之光離開你的皮膚時, &6恢復生機&e的能量也離開了...

languages.en_US: &aThe waters die down and grow still...
languages.zh_TW: &a水再次的平靜下來, 並將會保持增長...

languages.en_US: &aThe air turns cooler and you wipe the sweat from your forehead...
languages.zh_TW: &a空氣轉涼, 你擦去額頭上的汗水...

languages.en_US: &7For the weather &e%1, &7the effects are:
languages.zh_TW: &7對於天氣 &e%1, &7效果為:

languages.en_US: %1Your world is in %2
languages.zh_TW: %1你在的世界是 %2

languages.en_US: &7The weather is currently &2%1
languages.zh_TW: &7當前的天氣是 &2%1

languages.en_US: &eToday is Day %1 of %2
languages.zh_TW: &e今天是第 %1 天 (共 %2 天)

languages.en_US: &7To see the effects of this weather, use the command &e/seasons effects
languages.zh_TW: &7要查看天氣的效果影響, 請使用指令 &e/seasons effects

languages.en_US: &7You can currently list: %1
languages.zh_TW: &7你目前可以列出: %1

languages.en_US: &7Usage: &e/seasons list <option>
languages.zh_TW: &7用法: &e/seasons list <option>

languages.en_US: &cThere are no lists of that type available!
languages.zh_TW: &c沒有該類型的列表!

languages.en_US: &cYou do not have permission to do that!
languages.zh_TW: &c你沒有權限執行此操作!

languages.en_US: &cThe server administrator has disabled all effects!
languages.zh_TW: &c伺服器管理員已關閉所有效果!

languages.en_US: &cThis world is barren and full of darkness... There are no seasons here.
languages.zh_TW: &c這個世界荒蕪的, 並充滿著黑暗... 這裡沒有季節之分.

languages.en_US: &7Time shatters before you and now it is &bDay %1
languages.zh_TW: &7時間在你眼前破碎, 現在是 &b第 %1 天

languages.en_US: &7The skies grow silent and with a great rumble, the weather is now %1
languages.zh_TW: &7天空變得寂靜, 伴隨著巨大的轟鳴聲, 現在的天氣是 %1

languages.en_US: &7The air around you changes mystically and becomes %1
languages.zh_TW: &7周圍的空氣神秘的變化, 變成 %1

languages.en_US: &e&lSeasons&7∙ &r
languages.zh_TW: &e&lSeasons&7∙ &r

languages.en_US: &c&lCATASTROPHIC WEATHER ALERT - Take care to plan your day
languages.zh_TW: &c&l災難性的天氣警報 - 小心規劃你的一天

languages.en_US: &7The weather has changed
languages.zh_TW: &7天氣已改變

languages.en_US: &7The season has changed
languages.zh_TW: &7季節已改變
